Viewing Tasks in StarTeam

If you use the StarTeam Microsoft Project Integration, StarTeam contains two types of tasks: those that were created in StarTeam and those that were created in Microsoft Project. These tasks differ in the following ways:

  • They use different icons in the Task pane.

  • They have some properties in common, but tasks created in Microsoft Project have many more properties.

  • They have different restrictions on the fields that can be edited from StarTeam.
